metadata.title: CVE-2022-1507 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
chafa: NULL Pointer Dereference in function gif_internal_decode_frame atlibnsgif.c:599 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via acrafted input file. in GitHub repository hpjansson/chafa prior to 1.10.2.chafa: NULL Pointer Dereference in function gif_internal_decode_frame atlibnsgif.c:599 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via acrafted input file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1507` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chafa - 1.12.3-1
libchafa0 - 1.12.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chafa package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.3-1').
